verses.verse: אֵיכָה֙ <WH349> how יוּעַ֣ם <WH6004> become dim זָהָ֔ב <WH2091> How is the gold יִשְׁנֶ֖א <WH8132> changed הַכֶּ֣תֶם <WH3800> fine gold הַטּ֑וֹב <WH2896> [how] is the most תִּשְׁתַּפֵּ֙כְנָה֙ <WH8210> are poured out אַבְנֵי־ <WH68> the stones קֹ֔דֶשׁ <WH6944> of the sanctuary בְּרֹ֖אשׁ <WH7218> in the top כָּל־ <WH3605> of every חוּצֽוֹת׃ <WH2351> of every street ס

בְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> sons צִיּוֹן֙ <WH6726> of Zion הַיְקָרִ֔ים <WH3368> The precious הַמְסֻלָּאִ֖ים <WH5537> comparable בַּפָּ֑ז <WH6337> to fine gold אֵיכָ֤ה <WH349> how נֶחְשְׁבוּ֙ <WH2803> how are they esteemed לְנִבְלֵי־ <WH5035> pitchers חֶ֔רֶשׂ <WH2789> as earthen מַעֲשֵׂ֖ה <WH4639> the work יְדֵ֥י <WH3027> of the hands יוֹצֵֽר׃ <WH3335> of the potter ס

גַּם־ <WH1571> Even [תַּנִּין כ] (תַּנִּים֙ <WH8568> dragon ק) חָ֣לְצוּ <WH2502> draw out שַׁ֔ד <WH7699> the breast הֵינִ֖יקוּ <WH3243> they give suck גּוּרֵיהֶ֑ן <WH1482> to their young ones בַּת־ <WH1323> the daughter עַמִּ֣י <WH5971> of my people לְאַכְזָ֔ר <WH393> [is become] cruel [כִּי <WH3283> ostrich כ] [עֵנִים כ] (כַּיְעֵנִ֖ים <WH3283> ostrich ק) בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <WH4057> in the wilderness ס

דָּבַ֨ק <WH1692> cleaveth לְשׁ֥וֹן <WH3956> The tongue יוֹנֵ֛ק <WH3243> of the sucking child אֶל־ <WH413> to חִכּ֖וֹ <WH2441> to the roof of his mouth בַּצָּמָ֑א <WH6772> for thirst עֽוֹלָלִים֙ <WH5768> the young children שָׁ֣אֲלוּ <WH7592> ask לֶ֔חֶם <WH3899> bread פֹּרֵ֖שׂ <WH6566> [and] no man breaketh אֵ֥ין <WH369> no לָהֶֽם׃ <WH1992> like ס

הָאֹֽכְלִים֙ <WH398> They that did feed לְמַ֣עֲדַנִּ֔ים <WH4574> delicately נָשַׁ֖מּוּ <WH8074> are desolate בַּחוּצ֑וֹת <WH2351> in the streets הָאֱמֻנִים֙ <WH539> they that were brought up עֲלֵ֣י <WH5921> in תוֹלָ֔ע <WH8438> in scarlet חִבְּק֖וּ <WH2263> embrace אַשְׁפַּתּֽוֹת׃ <WH830> dunghills ס

וַיִּגְדַּל֙ <WH1431> is greater עֲוֹ֣ן <WH5771> For the punishment of the iniquity בַּת־ <WH1323> of the daughter עַמִּ֔י <WH5971> of my people מֵֽחַטַּ֖את <WH2403> than the punishment סְדֹ֑ם <WH5467> of the sin of Sodom הַֽהֲפוּכָ֣ה <WH2015> that was overthrown כְמוֹ־ <WH3644> in רָ֔גַע <WH7281> as in a moment וְלֹא־ <WH3808> and no חָ֥לוּ <WH2342> stayed בָ֖הּ יָדָֽיִם׃ <WH3027> and no hands ס

זַכּ֤וּ <WH2141> were purer נְזִירֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH5139> Her Nazarites מִשֶּׁ֔לֶג <WH7950> than snow צַח֖וּ <WH6705> they were whiter מֵחָלָ֑ב <WH2461> than milk אָ֤דְמוּ <WH119> they were more ruddy עֶ֙צֶם֙ <WH6106> in body מִפְּנִינִ֔ים <WH6443> than rubies סַפִּ֖יר <WH5601> [was] of sapphire גִּזְרָתָֽם׃ <WH1508> their polishing ס

חָשַׁ֤ךְ <WH2821> is blacker מִשְּׁחוֹר֙ <WH7815> than a coal תָּֽאֳרָ֔ם <WH8389> Their visage לֹ֥א <WH3808> are not נִכְּר֖וּ <WH5234> they are not known בַּחוּצ֑וֹת <WH2351> in the streets צָפַ֤ד <WH6821> cleaveth עוֹרָם֙ <WH5785> their skin עַל־ <WH5921> on עַצְמָ֔ם <WH6106> to their bones יָבֵ֖שׁ <WH3001> it is withered הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> has become כָעֵֽץ׃ <WH6086> it is become like a stick ס

טוֹבִ֤ים <WH2896> are better הָיוּ֙ <WH1961> are those חַלְלֵי־ <WH2491> [They that be] slain חֶ֔רֶב <WH2719> with the sword מֵֽחַלְלֵ֖י <WH2491> than [they that be] slain רָעָ֑ב <WH7458> with hunger שֶׁ֣הֵ֤ם <WH1992> for these יָז֙וּבוּ֙ <WH2100> pine away מְדֻקָּרִ֔ים <WH1856> stricken מִתְּנוּבֹ֖ת <WH8570> through for [want of] the fruits שָׂדָֽי׃ <WH7704> of the field ס

יְדֵ֗י <WH3027> The hands נָשִׁים֙ <WH802> women רַחֲמָ֣נִיּ֔וֹת <WH7362> of the pitiful בִּשְּׁל֖וּ <WH1310> have sodden יַלְדֵיהֶ֑ן <WH3206> their own children הָי֤וּ <WH1961> became לְבָרוֹת֙ <WH1262> they were their meat לָ֔מוֹ בְּשֶׁ֖בֶר <WH7667> in the destruction בַּת־ <WH1323> of the daughter עַמִּֽי׃ <WH5971> of my people ס

כִּלָּ֤ה <WH3615> hath accomplished יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> The LORD אֶת־ <WH853> חֲמָת֔וֹ <WH2534> his fury שָׁפַ֖ךְ <WH8210> he hath poured out חֲר֣וֹן <WH2740> his fierce אַפּ֑וֹ <WH639> anger וַיַּצֶּת־ <WH3341> and hath kindled אֵ֣שׁ <WH784> a fire בְּצִיּ֔וֹן <WH6726> in Zion וַתֹּ֖אכַל <WH398> and it hath devoured יְסוֹדֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <WH3247> the foundations ס

לֹ֤א <WH3808> Nor הֶאֱמִ֙ינוּ֙ <WH539> would not have believed מַלְכֵי־ <WH4428> The kings אֶ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the earth [וְכֹל כ] (כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all manner ק) יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> and all the inhabitants תֵבֵ֑ל <WH8398> of the world כִּ֤י <WH3588> Could יָבֹא֙ <WH935> should have entered צַ֣ר <WH6862> that the adversary וְאוֹיֵ֔ב <WH341> and the enemy בְּשַׁעֲרֵ֖י <WH8179> into the gates יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> of Jerusalem ס

מֵֽחַטֹּ֣את <WH2403> For the sins נְבִיאֶ֔יהָ <WH5030> of her prophets עֲוֹנ֖וֹת <WH5771> [and] the iniquities כֹּהֲנֶ֑יהָ <WH3548> of her priests הַשֹּׁפְכִ֥ים <WH8210> that have shed בְּקִרְבָּ֖הּ <WH7130> in the midst דַּ֥ם <WH1818> the blood צַדִּיקִֽים׃ <WH6662> of the just ס

נָע֤וּ <WH5128> They have wandered עִוְרִים֙ <WH5787> [as] blind בַּֽחוּצ֔וֹת <WH2351> [men] in the streets נְגֹֽאֲל֖וּ <WH1351> they have polluted בַּדָּ֑ם <WH1818> themselves with blood בְּלֹ֣א <WH3808> not יֽוּכְל֔וּ <WH3201> so that men could יִגְּע֖וּ <WH5060> touch בִּלְבֻשֵׁיהֶֽם׃ <WH3830> their garments ס

ס֣וּרוּ <WH5493> unto them Depart טָמֵ֞א <WH2931> ye [it is] unclean קָ֣רְאוּ <WH7121> They cried לָ֗מוֹ ס֤וּרוּ <WH5493> depart ס֙וּרוּ֙ <WH5493> depart אַל־ <WH408> not תִּגָּ֔עוּ <WH5060> touch כִּ֥י <WH3588> So נָצ֖וּ <WH5132> not when they fled away גַּם־ <WH1571> again נָ֑עוּ <WH5128> and wandered אָֽמְרוּ֙ <WH559> they said בַּגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> among the heathen לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not יוֹסִ֖יפוּ <WH3254> They shall no more לָגֽוּר׃ <WH1481> sojourn ס

פְּנֵ֤י <WH6440> The anger יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD חִלְּקָ֔ם <WH2505> hath divided לֹ֥א <WH3808> He will not יוֹסִ֖יף <WH3254> them he will no more לְהַבִּיטָ֑ם <WH5027> regard פְּנֵ֤י <WH6440> not the persons כֹהֲנִים֙ <WH3548> of the priests לֹ֣א <WH3808> not נָשָׂ֔אוּ <WH5375> them they respected [זְקֵנִים כ] (וּזְקֵנִ֖ים <WH2205> aged ק) לֹ֥א <WH3808> did not חָנָֽנוּ׃ <WH2603> they favoured ס

[עֹודֵינָה כ] (עֹודֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH5751> while ק) תִּכְלֶ֣ינָה <WH3615> as yet failed עֵינֵ֔ינוּ <WH5869> As for us our eyes אֶל־ <WH413> to עֶזְרָתֵ֖נוּ <WH5833> help הָ֑בֶל <WH1892> for our vain בְּצִפִּיָּתֵ֣נוּ <WH6822> we have watched צִפִּ֔ינוּ <WH6822> have watched אֶל־ <WH413> about גּ֖וֹי <WH1471> for a nation לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יוֹשִֽׁעַ׃ <WH3467> [that] could not save ס

צָד֣וּ <WH6679> They hunt צְעָדֵ֔ינוּ <WH6806> our steps מִלֶּ֖כֶת <WH1980> walk בִּרְחֹבֹתֵ֑ינוּ <WH7339> in our streets קָרַ֥ב <WH7126> is near קִצֵּ֛ינוּ <WH7093> our end מָלְא֥וּ <WH4390> are fulfilled יָמֵ֖ינוּ <WH3117> our days כִּי־ <WH3588> for בָ֥א <WH935> is come קִצֵּֽינוּ׃ <WH7093> for our end ס

קַלִּ֤ים <WH7031> are swifter הָיוּ֙ <WH1961> become רֹדְפֵ֔ינוּ <WH7291> Our persecutors מִנִּשְׁרֵ֖י <WH5404> than the eagles שָׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> of the heaven עַל־ <WH5921> on הֶהָרִ֣ים <WH2022> us upon the mountains דְּלָקֻ֔נוּ <WH1814> they pursued בַּמִּדְבָּ֖ר <WH4057> for us in the wilderness אָ֥רְבוּ <WH693> they laid wait לָֽנוּ׃ ס

ר֤וּחַ <WH7307> The breath אַפֵּ֙ינוּ֙ <WH639> of our nostrils מְשִׁ֣יחַ <WH4899> the anointed יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD נִלְכַּ֖ד <WH3920> was taken בִּשְׁחִיתוֹתָ֑ם <WH7825> in their pits אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> of whom אָמַ֔רְנוּ <WH559> of whom we said בְּצִלּ֖וֹ <WH6738> Under his shadow נִֽחְיֶ֥ה <WH2421> we shall live בַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> among the heathen ס

שִׂ֤ישִׂי <WH7797> Rejoice וְשִׂמְחִי֙ <WH8056> glad בַּת־ <WH1323> O daughter אֱד֔וֹם <WH123> of Edom [יֹושַׁבְתִּי כ] (יֹושֶׁ֖בֶת <WH3427> abide ק) בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land ע֑וּץ <WH5780> of Uz גַּם־ <WH1571> well עָלַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH5921> and תַּעֲבָר־ <WH5674> also shall pass כּ֔וֹס <WH3563> the cup תִּשְׁכְּרִ֖י <WH7937> through unto thee thou shalt be drunken וְתִתְעָרִֽי׃ <WH6168> and shalt make thyself naked ס

תַּם־ <WH8552> is accomplished עֲוֹנֵךְ֙ <WH5771> The punishment of thine iniquity בַּת־ <WH1323> O daughter צִיּ֔וֹן <WH6726> of Zion לֹ֥א <WH3808> no יוֹסִ֖יף <WH3254> he will no more לְהַגְלוֹתֵ֑ךְ <WH1540> carry thee away into captivity פָּקַ֤ד <WH6485> he will visit עֲוֹנֵךְ֙ <WH5771> thine iniquity בַּת־ <WH1323> O daughter אֱד֔וֹם <WH123> of Edom גִּלָּ֖ה <WH1540> he will discover עַל־ <WH5921> and חַטֹּאתָֽיִךְ׃ <WH2403> thy sins פ
